title: illai enban yaaraDa
sahitya:
illai enbAn yAraDA en appanait-tillaiyilE pAraDA



anupallavi



kallum kashindurugak-kaninda muruvaluDan kATSi aLikkum anda

karuNaic-cuDaroLiyai



caraNam 1



shOka mOhamaTra sutantira vIrargaL shuddha shivattil manam vaitta

jnAna dhIrargaL

dAgam taNinda upa shAnta parAyaNar santatam idayattil vandikkum

kaDavuLai



caraNam 2



kallai kaniyAkka valla pulavanaik-kalai vaDivAgiyayen kaNNAna

kaNNanai

ellA ulaginukkum iraivanai shuddhAnandan idayattil naTamADum cidambara nAthanai
